page.title: 16My Brother (age l8yrs.)
page.content:
My brother is eighteen years of age.At seventeen he took his driving test with my uncle, my brother passed his test first time.He likes to play squash sometimes.Now he is eighteen he has left school.Before he goes to university, he has to do a year's work on a farm.He has now gone away working on a farm at Twycross for about six months. He will then be going to Canada for another six months,without coming home,and then he will go to university.I miss my brother a lot.
My brother was a pupil at the King's School, Grantham. and was examined in four subjects for his Advanced Level, General Certificate of Education. His results which come in August will decide whether he goes to Reading University.
